text: Association between expression of <extra_id_0> intercellular adhesion molecule-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and integration of human T-cell-leukemia virus type 1 in adult T-cell leukemia cells .
event: <extra_id_0> <extra_id_0> Gene_expression expression <extra_id_0> Theme intercellular adhesion molecule-1 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1>

text: It is known that the expression levels of <extra_id_0> intercellular adhesion molecule-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) in adult T cell leukemia ( ATL ) cells are high , whereas those in T-lymphoid cells are not .

In order to investigate the factors that influence the induction of <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> molecules , Northern blot analysis to measure the expression level of <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNAs and Southern blot hybridization to analyze the integration of human T-cell-leukemia virus type 1 ( HTLV-1 ) provirus were done .
event: <extra_id_0> <extra_id_0> Regulation influence <extra_id_0> Theme induction <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Positive_regulation induction <extra_id_0> Theme ICAM-1 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Transcription expression <extra_id_0> Theme ICAM-1 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1>

text: The levels of <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression of ATL cells were generally higher than those of T-lymphoid cells .

However , ILT-mat cells and ATL16T ( - ) cells , although they were ATL cells , showed rather low surface <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression and <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression .
event: <extra_id_0> <extra_id_0> Gene_expression expression <extra_id_0> Theme ICAM-1 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Transcription expression <extra_id_0> Theme ICAM-1 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1>

text: Southern blot hybridization showed that only two and four bands were found in ILT-mat and ATL16T ( - ) cells , respectively , whereas > 10 bands were detected in other ATL cells .

These results suggest that monoclonal integration of HTLV-1 provirus to the genome of T cell , especially the number of integration sites , is one of the factors for induction of <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> molecules .
